problem_text: Circle J has a radius of 10 units, \odot K has a radius of 8 units, and B C = 5.4 units. Find J K.
compact_text: Circle J has a radius of 10 units, \odot K has a radius of 8 units, and BC = 5.4 units. Find JK.
annotat_text: Circle $J$ has a radius of $10$ units, $\odot K$ has a radius of $8$ units, and $BC=5.4$ units. Find $JK$.
